article.title: Pennsylvania and Delaware U.S. Export Assistance Centers Contact Information
article.short_title: PA and DE USEACs Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Pennsylvania and Delaware U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
Please visit the website of the office nearest you for additional contact information.

  • Philadelphia U.S. Export Assistance Center
  • Pittsburgh U.S. Export Assistance Center​

Philadelphia Office Contact Information

U.S. Export Assistance Center Philadelphia
The Curtis Center - Independence Square West
601 Walnut Street, Suite 580 West
Philadelphia, PA 19106-3304
Telephone: (215) 597-6101
Fax: (215) 597-6123

Pittsburgh Office Contact Information

U.S. Export Assistance Center Pittsburgh
Regional Enterprise Tower
425 Sixth Avenue, Suite 2950
Pittsburgh, PA 15219-1854
Phone: 412-644-2800
Fax: 412-644-2803

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Pennsylvania and Delaware U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
